id: Implementing DPDPA/Step 06 - Handling Data Principal Rights Requests
title: Step 06 - Handling Data Principal Rights Requests
description: One of the central features of the Digital Personal Data Protection Act (DPDPA), 2023 is that it empowers individuals, known as Data Principals, with enforceable rights over their personal data. Organizations (Data Fiduciaries) must be prepared to receive, process, and respond to these requests in a structured and timely manner.
